channel.title: Tellerium 718 Economy | All Skills | Need new members | Come join!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Staff (Owner) Rich (Co-Owner) [Empty] (Globle Moderator) [Empty] (Globle Moderator) [Empty]
Tellerium! 718
Double XP IS ON THE WEEKENDS SO COME EARLY BEFORE IT STARTS!
Its a new server so we will be updating alot! [:
Join the forums: [URL=http://"http://tellerium.forumotion.com"]http://tellerium.forumotion.com[/URL]
Webclient:[URL=http://"http://tellerium.forumotion.com"]http://tellerium.forumotion.com[/URL]
Client Download:[URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/g7t7jiz6ta8bwsy/Tellerium.jar"
RuneScape Private Server's are meant to be fun, thats why we have created Tellerium. Tellerium is packed with content from mini-games to pk'ing and every skill with good fast paced XP rates with easy to obtain items you wouldn't usually of gotten on RS. Check out some of the features we have to offer you! [:
Features:
All Skills are all fully working and trainable: (Including Dungeoneering. Summoning, Construction and Hunter!)
Attack Strength Defence Range Prayer Magic Runecrafting Construction Dungeoneering- Max Level 120!!![ Agility Herblore Thieving Crafting Fletching Slayer Hunter Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Farming Summoning!!
Mini-games:
Duel Arena Barrows Pest Control Tzhaar Warriors Guild Assault Recipe for disaster Normad Angry Goblin Castle Wars (Beta)(Will Finish) Dominion Tower
Pk'ing with pk points and rewards! FunPK Varrock GraveYard Edgeville Green Dragons
Bosses:
NEX! King Black Dragon Dagannoth Kings Tormented Demons Corporal Beast Forgotten Warrior Mad Mummy Barrel Chest Godwars
Loyalty System:
Every hour you play on the server you will gain 350 loyalty Points, these can be used to buy:
Rares Titles Pets Auras
Squeal Of Fortune! (SoF):
Everyday you get 2 spins and if you donate 2 as well. [Donators get equivalent of payment]
Skillcape emotes:
We have full working Skillcape emotes, Including the Completionist Cape!
Other Features:
Working Friend Chat SoF Optional full screen client/ Resizeable Client All weapon special attacks.
-HD- Full Hd
AND MORE!
Join today!!! - Rich[[/CENTER]
